abstract: David Chalian was recorded saying that Republican convention officials were “happy to have a party with black people drowning.”
snippet: David Chalian was recorded saying that Republican convention officials were “happy to have a party with black people drowning.”
lead_paragraph: 4:52 p.m. | Updated  Yahoo on Wednesday said it had fired David Chalian, the Web site’s Washington bureau chief, after he was recorded at the Republican National Convention saying that the convention officials were “happy to have a party with black people drowning.”

headline.main: Yahoo Fires Bureau Chief After a Live Mic Picked Up His Comments
